mapper.select: SELECT level, tbd.articleNO, tbd.parentNO, CASE WHEN LEVEL-1 > 0 then CONCAT(CONCAT(REPEAT(' ', level - 1),'â”— '), tbd.TITLE) ELSE tbd.TITLE END AS TITLE, content,imageFileName, writeDate,tbd.id,tbd.goods_id,g.goods_name,m.memFileName,m.uid FROM (SELECT fnc_hierachi() AS articleNO, @level AS level FROM (SELECT @start_with:=0, @articleNO:=@start_with, @level:=0) vars JOIN board WHERE @articleNO IS NOT NULL) fnc JOIN board tbd ON fnc.articleNO = tbd.articleNO, member m, goods g where tbd.id=m.id and tbd.goods_id = g.goods_id;
mapper.insert: insert into board(articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id, goods_id) values(#{articleNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id}, #{goods_id})
insert into board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, imageFileName, id, goods_id) values(#{articleNO}, #{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id}, #{goods_id})
mapper.select: select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 ,b.* from board b where (@ROWNUM:=0) < 16 and imageFileName != ''
